title: Rebooting for the Sequel
goal: Set up the long-term quest to fix (or further break) the world.
stakes_shift: Artie is now the most wanted entity in the multiverse.

bridge.to_next: Book 2: The Quest for the Source Code.

sections.title: The New Normal
sections.intent: Establish the new status quo for Artie and Fizz.

scenes.summary: Artie learns how to eat 'Data-Packets' instead of food.
scenes.outcome: Artie adapts to his new existence.

scenes.summary: Fizz explains that the only way to save the world is to reach the 'Server Room' at the center of the world.
Artie tests his 'NaN' HP by jumping off a cliff; he doesn't die, he just clips through the floor and ends up back at the top.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes his immortality is just as annoying as his 1 HP build.

sections.title: The Resistance
sections.intent: Introduce the faction that will help Artie in the future.

scenes.summary: A group of 'Beta-Testers' finds Artie in the Null-Zone.
scenes.outcome: Artie finds allies who know the world's secrets.

scenes.summary: The Beta-Testers reveal that Vane is still alive and has been 'upgraded' by the System to be a 'Patch-Hunter'.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry continues with higher stakes.

scenes.summary: Artie receives his first 'Legendary' quest: 'Delete the Admin'.
scenes.outcome: The series arc is locked in.

sections.title: The First Step
sections.intent: End on a high note of action and anticipation.

scenes.summary: Artie and his new allies prepare to leave the Null-Zone and head to the 'Glitch-Woods'.
Artie looks at the camera (or the sky) and says, 'I hope the next world has better drop rates,' before stepping into a portal.
